sentences.en: A cover , including an air cowl , is removably mounted to the housing proximate the air inlet.
sentences.cn: 外罩, 包括空气通风帽, 被可拆卸地安装在外壳的靠近空气入口处.

sentences.en: a monk in a dark habit and cowl
sentences.cn: 一个穿黑色长袍、戴黑风帽的僧侣

sentences.en: Central and South America having a cowl of thick hair on the head.
sentences.cn: 中美和南美的猴子,头顶有类似风帽的一簇毛发.

sentences.en: Disengage the coaxial cable grommet from the hole in the right cowl side outer panel.
sentences.cn: 从右前罩板外侧孔切断同轴电线保护环.

sentences.en: He looked up and found the face in the cowl regarding him closely.
sentences.cn: 他抬起头,发现那张兜帽中的脸正在仔细打量他.

sentences.en: He put on his cowl when It'started raining.
sentences.cn: 开始下雨时,他就戴上了风帽.

sentences.en: HEFTY FRONT COWL, 6 mm diamond plate steel.
sentences.cn: 重型前车斗:6毫米菱形盘钢.

sentences.en: It is hard to see his face because of the cowl he is wear.
sentences.cn: 他穿著蒙头斗篷,所以很难看清他的脸面.

sentences.en: It was hard to see his face because of the cowl he was wearing.
sentences.cn: 他穿著蒙头斗篷,所以很难看到他的脸.

sentences.en: Remove left cowl side trim panel.
sentences.cn: 拆下左仪表板侧装饰板.

sentences.en: Separate the lower A - pillar cowl trim from the A - pillar lower cowl.
sentences.cn: 从A - 柱下部前隔板上拆下下部A - 柱前隔板.

sentences.en: She sashayed up to my desk cowl as a cucumber.
sentences.cn: 她滑步行至我的书桌,像黄瓜一样的罩(cowl).

sentences.en: The cowl ( or hood ) does not make the monk.
sentences.cn: 穿袈裟的不一定是和尚.

sentences.en: The cowl does not make the monk.
sentences.cn: [谚]穿上袈裟不一定就是和尚,人不可貌相.

words.tran_cn: 给…穿上蒙头斗篷；使…成隐修士（cowl的过去分词）
蒙头斗篷；通风帽（烟囱顶上的）；连有头巾的修道士服

trans.tran_cn: 蒙头斗篷，连有头巾的修道士服，（烟囱顶上的）通风帽
trans.tran_en: a large  hood  that covers your head and shoulders

trans.tran_cn: 给…穿蒙头斗篷；给…装上风帽状物
